products.name: Alpha
products.description: Alpha is the perfect household assistant, helping with daily tasks such as cleaning, organizing, and managing schedules.

products.name: Beta
products.description: Beta specializes in personal care, offering companionship, monitoring health, and ensuring your well-being.

products.name: Gamma
products.description: Gamma is a multifunctional AI robot, ideal for security, smart home integration, and advanced home automation.

products.name: Zeta & Eta
products.description: Zeta is not just any AI, along with Eta, they represent the pinnacle of artificial intelligence evolution. As the first artificial twins to ever exist, they are a marvel of innovation and design, created for those who seek something truly extraordinary.
